Name: Formula Truck 2013
About the game: Formula Truck 2013 for Windows - PC is the official simulator of the popular Brazilian Formula Truck series - the most competitive truck racing series in the world! Experience the thrill of racing aboard the 5-ton, 1200 HP turbocharged super-trucks which compete in the series! Features Realistic truck racing simulator Light on system requirements
